statements: DELETE FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM atmospheric_pressure WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND pressure < 100.00;
DELETE FROM pressure_patterns_detected WHERE start_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND end_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM atmospheric_pressure_data WHERE pressure > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM pressure_patterns_detected WHERE pattern LIKE '%high%' OR pattern LIKE '%low%' AND (start_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' OR end_timestamp < '2022-02-15');
DELETE FROM pattern_data WHERE severity_level > 3 AND pattern_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Sensor WHERE location_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM pressure_readings WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND pressure > 100;
